channel.title: Keyboard on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Keyboard on mattischrome

item.title: Logitech K380 Review
item.description: Time for a little gear review. This is the Logitech K380 keyboard. It pairs with devices wirelessly over Bluetooth. I bought it to use with my Apple TV, iPad and iPhone. It runs on 2 AAA batteries, but the supplied batteries are not rechargeable. The keyboard is light and portable but you definitely know you have it in your bag. It’s lovely to type on. For a go-anywhere keyboard it has a surprisingly nice feel to the keys.
